repack.config.title: Re: Pack Configuration
repack.config.death.enableSounds.tooltip: If enabled, custom sounds will play upon death.
repack.config.death.specialChance.toolti: The chance for a special death event (1 in X deaths). Higher number means less frequent.
repack.config.death.screenEffect.tooltip: Choose the visual effect for special death.
repack.config.guide.enableBrewingGuide.t: If enabled, a guide image will be shown in the brewing stand GUI.
repack.config.guide.brewingGuideStyle.to: Choose the style of the brewing guide image (e.g., 'default', 'simple').
repack.config.guide.brewingGuidePosition: Choose where the brewing guide will be displayed relative to the GUI.
Adjust the horizontal position of the guide.
Adjust the vertical position of the guide.
repack.config.guide.brewingGuideWidth.to: Set the width of the brewing guide image in pixels.
repack.config.guide.brewingGuideHeight.t: Set the height of the brewing guide image in pixels.
